Valve Complete Pack ile satın aldığım efsane oyun... Daha önceden bütün oyunlarını defalarca bitirmeme rağmen, oyunsuzluk sıkıntısı çektiğim şu günlerde bana ilaç gibi gelen efsane oyun serisi.. Gerek evreni, gerekse diğer oyunlarıyla hem hikaye hem de karakterleriyle birbirine bağlanması beni benden almıştır gençliğimde. Ara ara, sıkıldıkça bütün seriyi oynarım.

İnternet kafelerde ilk Counter Strike ve Half-Life'nin LAN üzerinden oynanmasıyla bulaşmıştım bu oyuna. Şöyle ki, o zamanlar olmayan ingilizcem ile yanlışlıkla "Single Player" e tıklayarak keşfetmiştim oyunun hikayeyle beraber tek kişilik de oynanabileceğini. İlk bölümünde "Girişgah" diyebileceğimiz trende bulunduğumuz anlarda, 3-5 dk kadar bekleyip de trenden dışarı çıkamayınca "Bu ne la" diye tepki gösterip kapatmıştım. Bir kaç gün sonrasında, bekçi abiye kadar beklememiz gerektiğini anlamış ve bu evrenle tanışmış oldum. Hey gidi günler hey..

If you've never played a Half-Life game and aren't relatively familiar with the story and franchise, then this review might be for you. If you're just looking for a fresh perspective on one of your favorite classics then this review might also be for you. This was the first time I have ever played a Half-Life game. I'm afraid I missed it when it was released, however, I did play similar shooters from that era. I didn't think a review from me would be necessary for such a popular title like Half-Life but seeing that all of the top reviews for it are those ridiculous one or two sentence jokes, I thought that maybe my take on it would be welcome.

In Half-Life, you fill the shoes of Gordon Freeman, a theoretical physicist who's getting ready for an ordinary day at the office. Gordon Freeman apparently, dons his fancy HEV suit every morning after punching in on the time clock, and then runs around in a room that is not safe anyone not wearing said suit.

Long story short, something bad happens while on the job, and aliens decide to invade Gordon's workplace, Black Mesa labs. You then spend the rest of the game trying to get out of the now compromised Black Mesa facility. The structure is surprisingly large for a research lab and you'll spend quite some time traversing it's different levels, from labyrinthine industrial machinery to the sterile, clean laboratories where Freeman's colleagues go-a-sciencing. Without spoiling too much, the army becomes involved and for some unexplained reason, presumably a cover-up, considers you to be just as dangerous as the invading aliens.

That pretty much covers it, as far as an overall picture is concerned. You won't start with much, as far as weapons are concerned, however you'll slowly build up your collection as you romp through Black Mesa. The gameplay is smooth and uncluttered with too many bells and whistles. You run, shoot, and jump your way to the surface of the facility. Sometimes, you'll even push and pull some things to solve some very mild puzzles. The game can be quite challenging if you up the difficulty enough. And ammo is at a premium. You really have to think about what weapons you're using against which enemies and what is the most efficient way to kill them. Some weapons are better for killing different targets, which is a nice thing that makes this game more than just a mindless shooter.

There is little dialogue throughout this game. In fact, there are even a couple of levels where you won't encounter too terribly many enemies, however those are mostly reserved for the more industrial areas of Black Mesa.

The game is definitely dated, as it runs on the old 1998 GldSrc engine. If you're itching to get your nostalgia on, this can be a good thing, though. It reminded me a lot of Star Trek: Voyager - Elite Force from the early 2000's (unsurprisingly, as Raven Software admitted Half-Life was their inspiration for Elite Force). It can also be considered reminiscent of Doom, in it's tone, especially in the later levels I think. If you really just aren't in the mood of '98 graphics, thought, you could always get the Source version of the game, which isn't terribly different, but does give it that extra little oomph you may be looking for.

All in all, there weren't many cons in this game for me, except for it's lack of exposition. I think that may be more of a sign of it's age, however. Like I said, there isn't much dialogue and if you're looking for a lot of story, you won't really find it in this game. However, I've been told that HL2 has more of that sort of thing. I also mentioned above that ammo can be hard to find and many might consider that to be another negative trait. That's just something that will come down to personal preference, though. At least I never found myself bored while playing. The end boss was pretty unforgiving, though. The technical difficulty of defeating the final boss was fairly frustrating and they didn't exactly make the mechanics of doing it very smooth. This also seems to be a relic from gaming's past, though.

All things considered, I really enjoyed this game. I came it with mostly a fresh perspective, as I knew little about the tone of Half-Life and I knew little of the story. Even though I never played this as a kid, the nostalgia from shooters of it's era was enough to make me smile from time to time. If you played Quake III or games like it, you might also notice some of the minor similarities. When you consider that this was Valve's debut product, it makes it all seem that much more impressive.

[h1]Beklenmedik Sonuçlara Hazır Olun[/h1]

Half life belkide çoğumuzun oynamadığı bir oyun olsa bile en azında adını bildiğiniz [u] cidden mükemmel [/u] bir başyapıt. Çıktığı zamanında fps oyunlarının bile hikaye anlatabileceğini herkese gösterdi ve fps türünde yeni bir çağ başlattı. 

Hikaye Gordan Freeman ters giden deneyin ardından Black Mesa tesisinden kaçışını konu almaktadır. Şahsen elimizde levye ile koridorlarda Xen gezegeninden gelen küçük şirin headcrapler ile mücadele etmek mükemmel. Daha fazla spoiler vermemek için bu kadar anlatıyorum siz kendiniz deneyimleyin oyunu. 

Oyunun oynanışına bakacak olursak günümüz fps oyunlarını belirlediği için bildiğimiz fps işte. Ama tek fark oyun anlatımı tek düzey hikaye anlatımıdır bence. Oyunda ara sahne yok ve her şey biz etrafta çılgınca koşarken bize anlatılıyor.

[h1]Bu oyuna olan sevgim yüzünden sabahlara kadar övgü yağmuruna tutabileceğim Half Life benden 10 üzerinden 9.9 puan aldı.[/h1]

[spoiler] neden 0.1 kırdın derseniz o kadar hata kadı kızında da olur. [/spoiler]

At first, I thought that this game was somewhat of a load of bull wrapped in a taint of nostalgia. But after playing it again and again, the overall value of the game becomes more apparent and worthwhile, especially when marveling at the technological breakthroughs this game has for its time and the scale of the adventure unbeknownst before its initial release. I am very proud to be one of the many other fans who can appreciate this game, its sequels, its community, and its pending conclusion.

Eu achava que half life não era um jogo bom, talvez ate mesmo uma porcaria mais quando eu joguei meu deus que jogo e esse! jogabilidade assustadoramente perfeita armas satisfatórias (as antigas eram muito satisfatórias também mais com essa atualização ficaram melhores ainda) inimigos muito legais, gameplay divertida e física muito boa para época. Bem eu diria que o ponto forte de Half-Life 1 não seria a historia pois ela e muito igual a do jogo DooM, não estou dizendo que a historia e ruim não, ela é muito boa mais ela e muito igual a do DooM como a cascata de ressonância criou portais os alíens se teleportam para a base black mesa igual no DooM, so que não foi uma cascata de ressonância, mais um incidente com portais assim demônios saindo por todo lado, mais existem diferenças na historia como os militares. Mais saindo desse lado este jogo e muito bom, eu amei, ja o Half-Life Source? bem se a VALVe atualizar ele ele vai ficar muito bom como sua versão normal, bem infelizmente a VALVe só liga pro LXGO, nunca veremos isso tão cedo. Recomendo compre e se divirta! (Dica para entender a historia e necessário zerar o game 3 vezes prestando atenção em cada cientista e em cada guarda, e também cada canto de black mesa para entender a historia okay?

Это скорей не шутер а игра менеджмента ресурсов, которые ты находишь, потому что эффективность прохождения не зависит напрямую от моторного скилла. 

С современными проектами она не способна конкурировать, но есть фишка которую я хотел бы почаще видеть: игра очень ненавязчивая. За исключением пары моментов у тебя не отбирают контроль и не волочат за шкирку по сюжету. Правда зачастую, когда подобное есть в игре, присутствует также и куданахренмнеидти-фактор. В этом примере он не критичен, но тоже есть, и поэтому мне иногда приходилось побродить по уровню. 

Расстроило, что это ЛЕГАНДА ШУТЕРОВ, а стрелять невесело. Если быть точным, на самых веселых пушках (револьвер, пистолет, дробовик) очень быстро утекают патроны и приходится пользоваться чем-то отсосным вроде автомата, с которого ты никогда ни в кого не попадешь, а если попадешь, то только на расстояниях, на которых эффективен дробовик или арбалета, который вроде как создан, что бы расстреливать водных монстров, но из-за баллистики их гораздо легче фомкой забить. 

Если покупать то покупать по скидке. Вам понравится если вам нравятся классические Биохазарды или Сайлент Хиллы, но вы хотите поиграть во что-то чуть-чуть более подвижное.

i love it.

Я слышал про эту игру много раз. И вот в 2019 году я решил поиграть в неё. Ни одна игра не вызывала такой восторг, тут практически все просто афигенно. Геймлей отменный, разнообразие хлещет и в игровых ситуациях и в оружии, и врагах. Эта игра шедевр не только своего времени, но и нынешнего. Купите и пройдите игру, и если вы любитель шутеров, то не пожалеете.  Не забудьте сделать скидку на графику игра 1998 года выпуска как никак.
 Минусы в игре по мне это: 
1) лестницы(спуск по ним адский, можно запросто разбиться);
2) прыжки на дистанцию(можно запросто перелететь, неплохо было бы добавить задержку после прыжка как в Counter-Strike); 
3) местами ИИ тупит(это совсем маленький минус и скорее исключение, на сложном уровне сложности на котором проходилась игра ИИ врагов зверский, по крайне мере ИИ людей врагов совсем беспощадный).
4) Гордон вертит оружие слишком часто, даже если вы будете идти и это мешает прицеливаться, лучше было бы, если он вертел оружие, когда долго стоит на месте.
Плюсов у игры много, сконцентрируюсь на  том, что понравилось лично мне:
1) обилие врагов и их ИИ очень сильно удивляет (проходил на сложном уровне сложности), люди будут закидывать гранатами ручными и с подстволки автомата, все враги будут искать уркытие.
2)обилие оружия. В арсенале будут иметься не только людское оружие, но даже инопланетное.
3) проработанный игровой мир, люди в игре реагируют на игрока фразами, что очень приятно.
4) музыка очень приятна на слух

Half life is a classic and i absolutely love it, the story is good and no cutscenes wich can be good because your always in full control, i enjoy this game alot and the shortcut glitches you can take are just great XD. my favourite creatures have gotta be vortigaunts like honestly there awesome and i love there sounds, as much as i freaking love this game you can tell xen got rushed XD. other then that there are nice details in this that are just great for its time and i still love it, you can interact wit things at start of game which is fun. what else is great about this game is how re_playable it is.

You don't need me to soapbox about this one. It's crisp combat and storytelling strategies at their peak. This is one of the best first person shooters ever made and it feels great to play. All that's bad about it is the fact that it's a little out of date, but that didn't bother me much, and Black Mesa does exist to heal those wounds.

10/10

Time goes on and this is one of the few games that nostalgia doesn't make it seem better than it was. I have more fun playing it now actually that I'm not a 10 year old that struggled to solve the puzzles. This game is still the pinnacle of FPS games. Nothing can ever top the depth and action that's involved in this arcadey sci-fi shooter game. I'd rather play this game than any of the modern shooter games that are on the market. 













Half Life 3 will never come. Give up. ;)
